channel.title: 3 Questions! I need to know this, please
channel.description:
1. How can I change my ::info or ::rules thing to say what I want. I don't know where to go to change my info in there.
2. How can I make a ::commands, with that page that pops up?
3. How can I change my weapons to be members only, or non members?
PLEASE, and THANKS!
